body.p: The tasks must be defined by differents fields :

ul.li: Name : used to identify task. Think to put a complete name because if there is lots of tasks, it must be better to find task you want to display.
Active : enable or disable a task.
Communication : Push (server wake agent and give task to it) or Pull (server wait agent contact server and get tasks from it)

Permanent : some tasks may be permanent. these tasks are defined in other menu (for example in IP range of fusinvsnmp plugin). For example, a task must be sent to agent all 10 minutes and we don't recreate a task for each time.
Periodicity : define time between 2 runs of this task.
